name: starlist-app
description: Flutter Web with BrowserSync for instant reload

scripts.sbom:dart: dart pub global activate cyclonedx_dart && cyclonedx-dart > sbom-dart.json
scripts.preinstall: node -e "const v=process.versions.node.split('.')[0]; if(Number(v)<20){console.error('Node>=20 required. Run `nvm use`'); process.exit(1)}"
scripts.dev: echo 'Run: npm run start:bs in separate terminal, then ./scripts/c.sh'
